On May 5, 2009 2:11pm, Jim Webber <jim@...> wrote:

> Leonard Richardson would describe that as a level 2 service in his

> (excellent) taxonomy. Such services embrace URIs and HTTP but lack

> hypermedia. RESTful services are level three which is level 2 +

> hypermedia.


That classification seems interesting, can you provide some references?

--001636c5a90787570804692a8ccf
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
